Bitcoin (BTC) Network Leads Investigators to Darknet Pornography Link

Cryptocurrency News 32 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 10:01AM ET)

US and Korean authorities used (BTC) tracking methods to bust one of the largest rings for the sale of child pornography, reported Bloomberg. The global crackdown charged 337 persons with darknet activity, and led to the indictment of Jong Woo Son, 23, for running a darknet site. Jong Woo Son is already in custody and serving a sentence in South Korea. Among the 337 arrested are site users from Korea and the US, including law enforcement officers.
